ðŸ”¥ Graphite | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: 2D content creation with a focus on procedural and non-destructive workflows.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ 2D vector and raster graphics editing â€¢ Node-based, non-destructive, procedural workflow â€¢ Layer-based compositing â€¢ All-in-one graphics toolbox â€¢ Support for photo editing, motion graphics, digital painting, desktop publishing, and VFX compositing
ðŸ“– Summary: Graphite is a free, open-source 2D graphics editor that combines traditional layer-based editing with a modern node-based procedural workflow. It aims to be an all-in-one graphics toolbox, supporting vector and raster editing, photo editing, motion graphics, and more, built around a core node graph for non-destructive editing.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ HomeDockOS | Vue
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Self-hosting applications and managing a personal cloud on various platforms (Raspberry Pi, x86 systems, etc.)
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Universal Compatibility across OS and architectures â€¢ Privacy by Design for secure data management â€¢ Seamless Integration with web-based access â€¢ One-click app installation via App Store â€¢ SSL-Ready Deployments for secure connections
ðŸ“– Summary: HomeDock OS is a versatile home server operating system designed for self-hosting. It offers an intuitive app store, seamless multi-platform support, and prioritizes privacy and control. It allows users to easily manage their personal cloud on devices like Raspberry Pi and x86 systems.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ ruoyi-ai | Java
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Rapid development and deployment of personalized AI applications.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Full-stack open-source system â€¢ Localized RAG solution (Langchain4j, Milvus/Weaviate/Qdrant, BGE-large-zh-v1.5) â€¢ Multi-modal AI engine (OpenAI, Azure, ChatGLM, DIFY) â€¢ Spring AI MCP support
ðŸ“– Summary: RuoYi AI is a full-stack AI development platform designed to help developers quickly build and deploy personalized AI applications. It offers features such as a localized RAG solution, multi-modal AI engine support, Spring AI MCP integration, and various enterprise-level extensions like instant messaging and payment system integrations. It also includes innovative functionalities like AI painting and PPT generation.

ðŸš€ no-ocr | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Simplifying AI-based PDF processing by enabling text and visual queries without relying on OCR.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Create and manage PDF/document collections â€¢ Automated ingestion to build Hugging Face-style datasets â€¢ Vector-based search over PDF pages in LanceDB â€¢ Visual question-answering on images and diagrams via Qwen2-VL
ðŸ“– Summary: No OCR is a tool that simplifies AI-based PDF processing by allowing users to process and query PDF documents without OCR. It uses embeddings for text and visual queries, supports visual question-answering, and is deployable via Docker. The tool enables users to create and manage document collections, build Hugging Face datasets, and perform vector-based searches.
